resources.string: The Natural History Museum looks after around 80 million specimens, from dodos to dandelions, dinosaurs to dragonflies. It is one of the world's most important collections of natural history.\n Color shown: Green\nCountry/Region of Origin: China
Find your favourite costumed LEGO minifigure on our hugely popular UT.\n Color shown: White\nCountry/Region of Origin: China

Bomber jacket in satin with a printed pattern. Small stand-up collar, zipper at front, long raglan sleeves, and discreet side-seam pockets. Ribbing with a glittery edge at collar, cuffs, and hem. Lined.\n Color Shown: Light pink\nCountry/Region of Origin: China
Lightweight, boxy sweatshirt with a printed flock design at front. Hood, dropped shoulders, and long sleeves with ribbed cuffs.\n Color shown: Apricot/zebra\nCountry/Region of Origin: Turkey
